text: The protesters were just a swarm of insects flooding the streets.
He's not a person, just a cog in the machine of their corporation.
Those people are absolute monsters for what they did.
Calling them vermin isn't an insult, it's a statement of fact.
My boss is a dragon, breathing fire every time a deadline is missed.
The politician is such a snake, you can't trust a word he says.
I can't stand that group of idiots.
The new software update is performing beautifully today.
Refugees are not a plague; they are human beings seeking safety.
The lawyer for the defense was a shark in the courtroom, completely ruthless.
